title: Cognitive Engagement Activities
summary: As a professional caregiver, I want to recommend interactive cognitive games and challenges to my clients based on their preferences so that I can help stimulate their cognitive functions and keep them engaged.

title: Physical Activity Tracking
summary: As a professional caregiver, I want to track my clients' physical activity levels so that I can encourage increased mobility and exercise, ultimately improving their health and well-being.

title: Personalized Activity Suggestions
summary: As a professional caregiver, I want ALFRED to recommend physical activities based on my clients' abilities and preferences so that I can promote suitable options for engagement and improve their well-being.

title: Activity Progress Monitoring
summary: As a professional caregiver, I want to monitor the progress and participation of my clients in cognitive and physical activities so that I can provide tailored support and ensure their engagement.

title: Feedback Mechanism for Activity Effectiveness
summary: As a caregiver, I want to receive feedback on the effectiveness and enjoyment of activities so that I can adjust future recommendations and provide personalized care.

title: Guided Exercise Routines
summary: As a professional caregiver, I want to initiate guided exercise routines for my clients so that they can engage in safe and appropriate physical activities that promote their health.
